duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining indirect tax technology solutions for compliance with state and local tax laws and regulations.
Uploading, reviewing, tracking, and reporting unclaimed items using 3rd party software.
Researching and answering taxability questions from internal and external customers.
Coordinating with other departments to ensure timely processing of tax adjustments.
Maintaining and organizing tax records and filings.
Researching and resolving State tax notices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Associates degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
